revision.text:
__NOTOC__ bool '''SetUserCVar''' (int ''playernumber'', str ''cvar'', int ''value'');
== Usage ==
Sets the [[CVARs|console variable]] of a particular player. Only mod-defined console variables through [[CVARINFO]] can be changed by using this function. Engine's built-in ones cannot be.
=== Parameters ===
* ''player'': [[PlayerNumber|player number]] of the player . * ''cvar'': name of a console variable. * ''value'': value to apply to said console variable.
=== Return value ===
Returns {{const|false}} if cvar is invalid, it is not writable, or the player doesn't exist. Returns {{const|true}} if the cvar is set successfully.
== Examples ==
{{noexamples}}
== See also == {{CVAR functions}}
[[category:ACS Level alteration functions]]
